text: Gavrić (Cyrillic script: Гаврић) is a Serbian surname that may refer to: *Momčilo Gavrić (1938-2010), Yugoslav and American footballer (soccer player) *Momčilo Gavrić (1906-1993), youngest corporal in World War I *Ivana Gavrić, British pianist *Dobrosav Gavrić, policeman, assassin of Željko Ražnatović "Arkan", famous Serbian bankrobber, private force commander in the Yugoslav Wars, mobster and businessman ==See also== *Gavrilović *Gavrović Category:Serbian-language surnames
title: Gavrić
